name: The Basics
description: Learn the fundamentals of movement, loops, and debugging.

levels.name: Cross the River
levels.description: Jonas built a bridge. Can you cross it?

intro.speaker: Zoey
intro.text: Hi! I'm Zoey. I need to get to the other side.

intro.speaker: Guide
intro.text: Greetings. I am the Guide. The Architect, Jonas, has constructed this path.

intro.speaker: Zoey
intro.text: Nice bridge, Jonas! Let's go.

intro.speaker: Guide
intro.text: Drag or click the 'Step' block to help Zoey cross.

hints.text: Drag or click the 'Step' block from the tray to the workspace.
You need to move 4 steps forward. Try adding more blocks.

levels.name: The Long Walk
levels.description: Jonas made this hallway really long. Don't get tired!

intro.speaker: Zoey
intro.text: Whoa, Jonas made this hallway super long!

intro.speaker: Guide
intro.text: The Architect values efficiency. Repeating commands manually is inefficient.

intro.speaker: Guide
intro.text: Use the 'Repeat' block to perform an action multiple times.

hints.text: Drag or click the 'Repeat' block, then put 'Step' INSIDE it.
You need to move 5 times. Set the repeat count to 5.

levels.name: Square Dance
levels.description: Jonas loves patterns. Can you spot this one?

intro.speaker: Zoey
intro.text: We need to go around that rock.

intro.speaker: Jonas
intro.text: I designed this to be a perfect square! Move, Move, Turn...

hints.text: Try moving forward twice, then turning right.
You can use a Loop to repeat the side of the square 4 times.

levels.name: The Bug
levels.description: Jonas left some broken code. Can you fix it?

intro.speaker: Zoey
intro.text: Jonas, your code is broken! I keep hitting a wall.

intro.speaker: Jonas
intro.text: It's not broken, it's... a test! That's a 'bug'. Can you fix it?

intro.speaker: Guide
intro.text: Find the wrong block and fix it!

hints.text: Use the 'Step' button (next to Play) to run the code one block at a time.
Look closely at the third turn. Is it turning the right way?

levels.name: Stairway to the Stars
levels.description: Jonas only gave us 6 blocks! Can you solve it?

intro.speaker: Zoey
intro.text: It looks like a staircase! Up, Right, Up, Right...

intro.speaker: Jonas
intro.text: I'm limiting your blocks to 6. You HAVE to use a loop!

hints.text: The pattern is: Move, Turn Left, Move, Turn Right.
You ran out of blocks! Put the pattern inside a Loop.

levels.name: The Big Zig Zag
levels.description: Bigger steps, same pattern. Jonas is testing your memory.

intro.speaker: Zoey
intro.text: This looks like the stairs, but bigger steps!

intro.speaker: Jonas
intro.text: I made the steps bigger. Can you adapt your code?

hints.text: It's like the stairs, but you need to move TWICE before turning.
Use a Loop to repeat the big step pattern.

levels.name: The Magic Spell
levels.description: Jonas found a magic spell. It's called a Function!

intro.speaker: Zoey
intro.text: Look at this old book! It says 'Spell of Leaping'.

intro.speaker: Jonas
intro.text: I wrote that! It's a Function. It lets you name a group of blocks.

intro.speaker: System
intro.text: Define the 'Jump' function to move 2 steps, then call it to cross the gaps.

hints.text: Click the 'Jump' tab in the tray to define what 'Jump' does.
You defined the function, but you need to use the 'Call Jump' block in your Main program!

levels.name: Pattern Recognition
levels.description: A giant staircase. Jonas says you can solve it with one spell.

intro.speaker: Jonas
intro.text: I built this giant staircase. Can you climb it?

intro.speaker: Zoey
intro.text: It repeats the same pattern over and over: Up two, Right two.

intro.speaker: Jonas
intro.text: Exactly! Use a Function to capture the pattern.

intro.speaker: System
intro.text: Create a 'Stairs' function for the pattern, then call it multiple times.

hints.text: Define the 'Stairs' function to go Up 2, Turn Right, Move 2, Turn Left (Wait, you only have Turn Right! Use 3 Turn Rights to turn Left).
Now call 'Stairs' multiple times in your Main program to climb to the top.
